channel.title: I think I have a Problem. :(
channel.description:
Well, I really need some help with my java (atleast I think that's the problem). Whenever I try to open a private server's .bat file, it says
[Code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I am able to play RuneScape, but everyone knows how boring RS is. I downloaded JDK 6.18, and I installed it with 0 problems. I just really wanted to know if someone could help me, because I REALLY want to play Private Servers again, and this computer is my only option.
I have set my enviromental variables, but I still can't play.
If you need to know anything else, just ask.
Thanks SOO much. (PS: If this is in the wrong section, can you move it to the right section any mods out there?)

item.title: I think I have a Problem. :(
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

You haven’t set your PATH to include your JDK’s bin folder

Read full topic
